author: Charles Passy
title: Li-Lac Chocolates Serves Sweet Nostalgia (and No Fancy Stuff)
text:
Li-Lac Chocolates’s signature sweets are the kind you remember from your childhood, milk and dark squares with the classic fillings, from mocha to marzipan, along with old-school favorites such as fudge and butter crunch.
The offerings have remained largely unchanged since the company’s inception in 1923, even as many New Yorkers have turned to cutting-edge chocolatiers for their Valentine’s Day’s shopping. As in businesses that feature bonbons with exotic flavors—olive-oil truffles, anyone?—or that tout “bean-to-bar” chocolate... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
